item.title: The Best/Worst UI You've Ever Used
item.description: UX Exchange throws down on The Best UI You've Ever Used. Stack Overflow throws up The Worst UI You've Ever Used. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/238177/worst-ui-youve-ever-used

item.title: BusinessWeek Best and Worst of the Web
item.description: BusinessWeek selects a jury to pick the best and worst designed web sites. BusinessWeek canvassed the Web's best and brightest designers—from Khoi Vinh of The New York Times' Web site to Don Norman, Silicon Valley's chief usability guru—to find out which site designs they rate — and which ones they hate. http://images.businessweek.com/ss/08/06/0623_best_worst_web/index_01.htm
